channel.title: 0x00sec Member Projects
channel.description:
Below is a curated list of member projects. These are not officially endorsed by 0x00sec. Instead, it's merely a collection of software projects our members contribute to or own. If you're looking for something to get involved with, here's a great place to start. Want to see your name on this list? Projects are organized by language, so edit the wiki and add your own using the established format below
## Python
[Legobot](https://github.com/Legobot/Legobot) is a Python based chatops framework that aims to be protocol-agnostic and allow connections to multiple backends simultaneously. It comes with a simple API for developing your own plugins, which we refer to as Legos.
Founder/maintainer: @fraq

item.title: 0x00sec Member Projects
item.dc:creator: fraq
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 30 days. New replies are no longer allowed.

Below is a curated list of member projects. These are not officially endorsed by 0x00sec. Instead, it’s merely a collection of software projects our members contribute to or own. If you’re looking for something to get involved with, here’s a great place to start. Want to see your name on this list? Projects are organized by language, so edit the wiki and add your own using the established format below

Python

Legobot is a Python based chatops framework that aims to be protocol-agnostic and allow connections to multiple backends simultaneously. It comes with a simple API for developing your own plugins, which we refer to as Legos.

Founder/maintainer: @fraq
